title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, Long Sleeve Plaid Button Down Casual Shirt, Corduroy Cuffs
descriptions:
Legendary Whitetails Men’s Buck Camp Flannel

Simple, comfortable, and made to last.

- Easy to wear: Relaxed fit with long sleeves. It’s not tight, so it moves with you when you reach or bend.
- Soft and warm: 100% cotton, soft brushed flannel. Medium weight (5.1 oz) for comfort indoors or outdoors. Great alone or over a T-shirt.
- Gentle on skin: Smooth corduroy on the collar and cuffs feels nice on the neck and wrists.
- Easy buttons: Button-down front and cuffs—no tricky zippers.
- Handy pocket: One chest pocket with a small slot for a pen or glasses.
- Built for comfort: Double-pleated back gives extra room across the shoulders—no tugging or pulling.
- Stays looking good: Fabric resists pilling and fading, so colors stay sharp wash after wash.
- Low fuss care: Follow the simple care tag to help control shrinkage and keep a good fit.
- True-to-photo style: Classic plaid pattern that looks good right out of the box—no break-in needed.
- Reliable quality: Imported, durable, and made for everyday wear.

Choosing your size:
- It has a relaxed fit. If you like a roomier feel, pick your usual size. If you prefer closer to the body, consider one size down.
- For best results, check the size chart before you order.

This flannel is a dependable, comfortable shirt for daily use—around the house, in the yard, or out on errands. Soft, simple, and made to keep you warm without fuss.
